profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Detroit Association of University of Michigan Women records

archdesc.bioghist: Organization established in 1912 of University of Michigan alumnae from Detroit Metropolitan area.
archdesc.scopecontent: History, constitution and by-laws, membership rosters, newsletters, minutes of annual meetings, treasurer's reports, various mailings, scrapbook of activities, and photographs.

corpname.primary_name: Detroit Association of University of Michigan Women
